response.overview: Compilation of Francophone avant-garde shorts put out by Cinèma Abbatoir. Contains the following:  Washing machine  Ca Ca Ca  Québec, 2007, 5min  HYMN TO PAN  François Miron  Québec, 2007, 5 min  Man spricht Deutsh  Filmgruppe Chaos  Allemagne, 2001, 2 min  Dream of samarra  Usama Alshaibi  Eu/Iraq, 2007, 1min  Sacré-cœur de Satan  Serge de Cotret  Québec, 2008, 10 min  Satan Bouche un Coin  Jean-Pierre Bouyxou  France, 1968, 10 min  YELLOW FEVER  Frédérick Maheux  Québec, 2008, 2min  Dead Man II:  Return of the dead man  Aryan Kaganof  Pays-bas, 1994, 25min  J.  Solomon Nagler &  Alexandre Larose  Canada, 2008, 7min  (sans titre)  Lucia Fezzuoglio  Québec, 2008, 3min  PASSAGE  Karl Lemieux  Québec, 2007, 15min  The Other American Dream  Enrique Arroyo  Mexique, 2004, 10 min
response.title: Backwards
